titleStmt.title: Wits common wealth The second part. A treasurie of diuine, morall, and phylosophicall similies, and sentences, generally vsefull. But more particularly published, for the vse of schooles. By F.M. Master of Arts of bot Vniuersities.
Palladis tamia
titleStmt.author: Meres, Francis, 1565-1647.

titleStmt.title: Wits common wealth The second part. A treasurie of diuine, morall, and phylosophicall similies, and sentences, generally vsefull. But more particularly published, for the vse of schooles. By F.M. Master of Arts of bot Vniuersities.

titleStmt.author: Meres, Francis, 1565-1647.
N. L. (Nicholas Ling), fl. 1580-1607. Politeuphuia.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby, and are to be sold by Richard Royston, at his shop in Iuie Lane,

notesStmt.note: Number 2 in the "Wits" series, presented as a sequel to "Politeuphuia wits common wealth" by Nicholas Ling.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
